headline.main: After years of selling products, Clairol now hopes to sell its image.

lead_paragraph: DOES she or doesn't she?'' was the slogan that made Clairol famous. Now Clairol is investing in another slogan for its hair color products, but this one has a different message. The new slogan, ''Clairol, a beauty all your own,'' will serve as a theme for all brands of Clairol hair color. It is intended to reflect the idea that beauty is not a specific size or look, but comes in all forms. To underscore the message, a thumb print has been superimposed over the word ''your'' in the slogan, an indication that beauty is as individual as a fingerprint.
abstract: Clairol's new slogan, 'Clairol, a beauty all your own,' will serve as theme for all brands of Clairol hair color; slogan is part of company's first effort in its 50-year history to burnish its image rather than sell individual products; advertising campaign was developed by FCB Worldwide; photo (M)
